content: this is a small slightly fitted vest knitted top down the back is first knit and the yoke and front are knitted after that it is for a petite frame for bust 30-34in and features 3in of positive ease the size as well as length can be easily adjusted by measuring your gauge and increasing stitches or row accordingly it features four buttons a beautiful ribbing on the arm holes and neck round or circular needles will both work perfect for those in-between days over a shirt or dress
